title: Quarkus 2.6.3.Final released - Maintenance release
content: We just released Quarkus 2.6.3.Final with a new round of bugfixes and documentation improvements. It is a safe upgrade for anyone already using 2.6. Full changelog If you are not using 2.6 already, please refer to the 2.6 migration guide. You can get the full changelog of 2.6.3.Final on GitHub....
